Featured Work

Design / Development

Double Toasted www.doubletoasted.com

The new home of the late great Spill.com community. At it’s height, the site saw 5 million visitors a month and over a half a million users. The new site employs a freemium model and an on-demand / subscription system for users to buy access to hilarious and biting movie and pop culture commentary. I built this social network and on-demand service using WordPress, Buddypress, & WooCommerce as the backbone.

Verdtek www.verdtek.com

A tech startup based in Austin who does great work with young people in the community (see generation tek).

Empyreal Instruments www.empyrealinstruments.com

Jeff Plankenhorn is a long-time Austin musician who collaborated with a guitar making company to come up with a unique new lap steel guitar concept. I built this simple one page marketing site for their flagship guitar “The Plank”.

Violet Marsh Photography blog.violetmarsh.com

The photograpahy blog of photographer, interior designer, and apartment therapy blogger, Tanya Lacourse. The blog was built around generating high SEO and built simply to run fast and serve her growing readership.

Naked Capitalism www.nakedcaptialism.com

The world’s most influential finance and economics blog with trenchant commentary, penetrating investigation, and insider political/regulatory analysis. I took their existing front-end and re-coded it to be 100% responsive and to look great on any screen, big or small.

The Cupcake Bar www.thecupcakebar.com

Create your own cupcakes! The cupcake bar is a unique catering business that allows people to add their own toppings, frostings, and more.

MAKT Creative www.maktcreative.com

A unique worked-owned marketing co-operative based out of San Francisco. MAKT was just starting out and needed a simple one page marketing site to get their business going.

Reconstruction Inc. www.reconstructioninc.org

The new online home for the deeply rooted, Philadelphia based Reconstruction Inc. The organization is led and organized by people of color and has done an incredible amount of work in the community with families and young people that are currently or formerly incarcerated.

Prickly Pair Farms www.pricklypairfarm.com

I built this Austin startup’s site with a couple of cool custom features like a flower inventory system and instagram feed.

Frame www.bodybyframe.com

A premier fitness program that monitors your nutrition and exercise habits and reprograms your behavior to achieve a balanced natural and healthy lifestyle. I did a few modifications to the existing build and added the before/after functionality on the results page.

Mike Lacourse

Well Built Web

My clients love me because I'm easy to work with and I do great work. I’m able to keep costs down by running a small shop and by working with technology that's affordable & open-source. From your brand to your next great idea, you can trust it will be developed thoughtfully and practically.

Open-source Frameworks

WordPress powers a staggering 23% of the internet and has grown into a mature and flexible framework that can power even a complex web business. Most WordPress extensions are affordable if not open-source and can sometimes cut the development costs on big projects up to 50-75%. Building on top of existing infastructure allows me to spend my time getting the details right, creating a satisfying, effective user experience.

No other platform embodies the spirit of democratic, open source software more than WordPress. The platform was built by the people, for the people, and in the process catalyzed the largest do-it-yourself community in the world. That means if you ever have a question about WordPress, it's probably been asked and answered a hundred times over.

The Final Product

You'll get a beautiful, fast, reliable web site coded and tested to work on mobile, tablet, and desktop resolutions as well as all the major browsers and operating systems. For most projects, I ask for half up front to begin work and half once the project is approved and uploaded to your server.

A Little History

After long hard days of arranging buttons and writing functions I spend my spare time crafting the perfect song and reading about social justice, politics, & philosophy. I also love travelling and exploring natural landscapes. Check out my latest adventures.

Are you doing important work in your commmunity? I'm sometimes able to offer discounted design services for non-profits, co-operatives, and collectives. Get in touch to learn more.
